title: Bring Your Furry Friends To Our Dog Park!
posting_body: ['Fun in the Sun', 'Find Your Perfect Balance', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 56', 'OR Text', '56', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Avana Stoneridge', '5505 Springhouse Drive, Pleasanton, CA, 94588', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 750 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Imagine your oasis; a vision of comfort, convenience and peace of mind.', 'At Avana Stoneridge, we understand the importance of finding balance.', "That's why we have designed a home specifically with you in mind, to support all of your needs in life, work and play.", 'Situated in the heart of Hacienda Business Park, home to over 500 diverse employers and arguably ranked among the best Schools in California, Avana Stoneridge is just steps away from boundless opportunities.', "If you're up for some fun on your day off, the area boasts 12 acres of beautiful parks just waiting to be explored, along with a wide variety of recreational activities.", 'Not to mention the Main Street charm, shopping and fine dining options that await you just moments away in Downtown Pleasanton.', "No matter what it is you're looking for, you're never far from it.", 'Find your perfect balance at Avana Stoneridge.', 'Features', '- Convenience of in-home washers and dryers*', '- Serene private balconies and patios', '- Extra storage space*', '- Spacious, modern kitchens', '- Central air', '- High speed internet and cable ready', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Cozy fireplace*', '- Bar Top Countertops', '- Walk-in closets', 'Community Amenities', '- State-of-the-art Fitness Center', '- Outdoor Patio', '- Professional Landscaping', '- Well-equipped Playground', '- Guest parking', '- Resident Community Room With Wi-Fi Access', '- Emergency Maintenance', '- Hacienda Business Park (24-hour courtesy patrol, parks, recreation and free commuter options)', '- Reserved covered Parking', '- 2 BBQ grill', '- Package Acceptance Service', '- Heated Swimming pool', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Office Hours', 'Mon-Fri 9:00am-6:00pm', 'Sat 10:00am-5:00pm', 'Sun 12:00pm-5:00pm', '4bTG0zAw']
